DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate acute safety deploy implant Altura Endograft treatment AAA subject candidate endovascular repair . Secondary objective evaluate acute longer-term safety performance Altura Endograft 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Performance Altura Endograft Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) Endovascular Repair
DOC.detailed_description: The primary safety endpoint study freedom Major Adverse Events ( MAE ) , composite endpoint consist death , stroke , paraplegia , myocardial infarction , respiratory failure , renal failure , bowel ischemia blood loss ≥ 1000 mL .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Understands sign Informed Consent Candidate endovascular open surgical repair infrarenal aortic aortoiliac aneurysm Abdominal aneurysm > 45 mm aneurysm growth > 10 mm/year Abdominal aneurysm neck angulation ≤ 60 degree Infrarenal nonaneurysmal neck 15 mm Infrarenal nonaneurysmal neck diameter 18 28 mm , inclusive Iliac artery land zone 15 mm length Iliac artery land zone diameter 8 18 mm , inclusive Patent iliac femoral artery , access vessel , size morphology , allow endovascular access minimum 14 Fr introducer sheath catheter Ability preserve least one hypogastric artery Life expectancy > one year American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) grade 1 3 , inclusive Able willing comply followup visit 30 day , 6 12 month annually 5 year Pregnant nurse An acutely rupture , leak emergent aneurysm An aortic dissection ( Type A B ) A mycotic , infected inflammatory aneurysm A thoracic , suprarenal juxtarenal aneurysm Previous surgical endovascular aneurysm repair abdominal aortic aneurysm aortoiliac aneurysm Severe iliac artery tortuosity Thrombus , calcification and/or plaque may complicate seal Evidence history intracranial bleeding aneurysm , myocardial infarction stroke within past 3 month Current angina active cardiac condition congestive heart failure , untreated worsen atrial arrhythmia , ventricular arrhythmia valvular disease Had plan unrelated major surgical interventional procedure within 1 month implantation study device Significant ( > 80 % ) diameter renal artery stenosis could readily treat Known sensitivity allergy nitinol polyester Known hypersensitivity contraindication anticoagulation contrast medium amenable pretreatment Contraindication antiplatelet , anticoagulant thrombolytic therapy ; Coagulopathy uncontrolled bleed disorder History heparininduced thrombocytopenia ( HIT ) Clinically morbidly obese require imaging would prevent Connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's EhlersDanlos syndrome ) Currently dialysis compromise renal function reflect serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL Compromised hepatic function Active infection time index procedure Endstage chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder ( COPD ) Religious , cultural objection receipt blood blood product Participating another research study involve investigational device drug may potentially affect study result Other medical , social psychological problem , opinion Investigator , preclude receive treatment procedure evaluation pre posttreatment
